segments.text: The boat is ready to leave.Everyone come onto the ship , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , where is my cabin ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your seat is in cabin No . 5 , the upper deck . It â€™ s near amid ship .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you direct the place for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ! ( Point out the direction . ) You can see a window there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome . Have a good trip !
segments.speaker: S1
